p: The prepared ethanolic extract from the walnut root was chemically characterized by gas chromatographyâ€“mass spectrometry (GC-MS), and the phytochemical experiments showed the presence of phenols, alkaloids, steroids, saponins, and tannins. In the GC-MS results, a total of 40 various compounds were identified [ 21]. However, no detailed study on the the content of phenolic and flavonoid chemicals of the walnut root has been reported.
